snippet: The pursuit of online speed has been a journey lasting decades, involving technology and even sleight-of-hand perceptual tricks. They range from Google's anticipating a user's clicks to Siri's stalling banter while it finds an answer.
abstract: The pursuit of online speed has been a journey lasting decades, involving technology and even sleight-of-hand perceptual tricks. They range from Google's anticipating a user's clicks to Siri's stalling banter while it finds an answer.

headline.main: Speed Bumps and Speed Boosts on the Internet
